page.title: 19Woodham Ferrers Conclusion
page.content: The area in which this survey has taken place is rural and the predominent feature of the landscape is one of arable farming. The majority of the residents are not of farming stock, do not work the land but travel to local towns or London to work. In contrast to the previous 100 years it is now a community which sees many of its occupants moving out and new ones moving in. The area has changed dramatically in the last 30 years from a country district to one infiltrated with elements of suburbia.
